title: 本格受験 - 英語
description: 基礎的な語彙と文法、表現を幅広く問う15問の模擬問題です。

questions.prompt_html: Select the correct form to complete the sentence: 'She _____ to the store yesterday.'
Fill in the blank with the correct preposition: 'He is good ___ math.'
What is the past participle of 'write'?
Choose the correct article: '___ apple a day keeps the doctor away.'
Which word best completes the sentence: 'They will ____ the project tomorrow.'
Select the word closest in meaning to 'difficult'.
Choose the correct comparative form: 'This book is _____ than that one.'
Select the correct translation: '朝食を抜かないで。'
Which sentence uses the present perfect tense?
options: She will go to school tomorrow.
He has lived here for five years.

questions.prompt_html: Choose the correct plural form of 'child'.
Select the correct idiom meaning 'to give up'.
Fill in the blank with the correct verb form: 'If it ____ tomorrow, we will cancel the picnic.'
Which sentence has correct subject-verb agreement?
options: The team are winning the game.
The list of items is on the table.
My friend and colleague is arriving soon.
